unnormalised: I think SBI is still the best for savings accounts, even though their interest rates are like, only 2.7% or something. My dad's been using them since forever, and he says their customer service is decent. Plus, you can easily transfer funds via UPI. I usually do a Rs. 5000 transfer to my brother every month. Just gotta watch out for those pesky ATM charges after 5 transactions!
normalised: I think S-B-I is still the best for savings accounts, even though their interest rates are like, only two point seven percent or something. My dad's been using them since forever, and he says their customer service is decent. Plus, you can easily transfer funds via U-P-I. I usually do a rupee five thousand transfer to my brother every month. Just gotta watch out for those pesky A-T-M charges after five transactions!
